Main pronunciation 主要发音: bǐng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning rice cakes.

English senses 英语理解: rice-cakes, biscuits

Usage example 用法举例: 餅乾 bǐng gān (cracker)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 2516

Shuowen 说文解字: 面餈也從食并聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 餅 from 餠 from mouth-eating (饣)飠食 shí and phonetic two-person-combine (并)幷𢆙 bìng simp 饼.

餠字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　餠； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1421第30
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】必郢切【正韻】補永切，?音丙。【說文】麫餈也。【釋名】餠，幷也，溲麫使合幷也。【揚子·方言】餠謂之飥，或謂之餦，或謂之餛。【文選】束晳有餠賦。　又水引餠。【齊書·何戢傳】太祖好水引餠，戢令婦女躬執事以進。【正字通】卽今之水麫也。　又【正韻】亦作䴵。【世說新語】何平叔美姿儀。魏明帝疑其傅粉，正夏日與熱湯䴵，汗出，色轉皎然。

暂无。

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Must Ying Cut [Zheng Yun] Make up forever cut,? Sound C. [Said the text] also. 【Release name】餠，幷乷，溫麫幷幷乷乷。 [Yangtze Dialect] Tie is called Zhifu, or Zhiding, or Won. [Selected Works] Shu Xi has a rich gift.　The water leads the way again. [Qi Shu·Biography of He Zhen] Taizu was good at attracting food, and instructing women to bow to deacons to advance. 【Zhengzitong】卽this is the water 麫 also.　 [Zheng Yun] also used as 䴵.
